mapper.select: SELECT a.BROADCAST_NO, a.MEMBER_ID, a.MEMBER_PROFILE, a.BROADCAST_TITLE, a.BROADCAST_CONTENT, a.BROADCAST_CATEGORY, a.BROADCAST_FLAG, a.BROADCAST_STARTDATE, a.BROADCAST_ENDDATE, a.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , b.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM BROADCAST ORDER BY BROADCAST_NO DESC ) b ) a WHERE a.RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 10

SELECT BROADCAST_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PROFILE, BROADCAST_TITLE, BROADCAST_CONTENT, BROADCAST_CONTENT, BROADCAST_CATEGORY, BROADCAST_FLAG, BROADCAST_STARTDATE, BROADCAST_ENDDATE, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM BROADCAST WHERE BROADCAST_NO = #{broadcast_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BROADCAST VALUES(BROADCAST_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_id}, (SELECT PROFILE_SAVEDNAME FROM PROFILE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}), #{broadcast_title}, #{broadcast_content},#{broadcast_category}, 'Y', SYSDATE, NULL, #{member_nickname})
mapper.update: UPDATE BROADCAST SET BROADCAST_FLAG = 'N', BROADCAST_ENDDATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT PROFILE_SAVEDNAME AS MEMBER_PROFILE FROM PROFILE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}

SELECT a.BROADCAST_NO, a.MEMBER_ID, a.MEMBER_PROFILE, a.BROADCAST_TITLE, a.BROADCAST_CONTENT, a.BROADCAST_CATEGORY, a.BROADCAST_FLAG, a.BROADCAST_STARTDATE, a.BROADCAST_ENDDATE, a.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , b.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM BROADCAST ORDER BY BROADCAST_NO DESC ) b ) a WHERE a.RNUM > #{lastnum} AND RNUM <= #{lastnum} +10
